attributes.action: take a good look at everything such as fuel,food and the general state of the country and start again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: basically a petition to sum up all petitions, scratch everything and start again from scratch before the entire country becomes a complete loss.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
